016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema;
017
018/**
019 * @author rickardoberg
020 */
021public enum Types {
022    Null,
023    Boolean,
024    Object,
025    Array,
026    Number,
027    Integer,
028    String;
029
030    public static Types typeOf(Class<?> type) {
031        return switch (type.getName()) {
032            case "long", "java.lang.Long", "int", "java.lang.Integer" -> Types.Integer;
033            case "double", "java.lang.Double", "float", "java.lang.Float" -> Types.Number;
034            case "boolean", "java.lang.Boolean" -> Types.Boolean;
035            case "java.util.List", "java.util.Set", "com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode" -> Types.Array;
036            case "java.util.Map", "com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode", "com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.model.ResourceObject" -> Types.Object; // TODO Invisible dependency here, could break later without us knowing about it
037            case "java.time.Period", "java.lang.String" -> Types.String;
038            default -> Types.String;
039        };
040    }
041}
